typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		gender as string,
		country as string,
		department_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(gender=="female",
	gender=="male",
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(female, male)
ConditionalSplit1@female sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@male sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
